createJCas

                                                   org.apache.uima.resource.metadata.TypeSystemDescription typeSystemDescription,
                                                   boolean isXmi)
                                            throws org.apache.uima.UIMAException,
                                                   IOException
This method creates a new JCas and loads the contents of an XMI or XCAS file into it.

Parameters:
xmlFileName - a file name for an XML file containing XMI or XCAS content.
typeSystemDescription -
isXmi - if true, than assume XMI format. Otherwise, assume XCAS.

org.apache.uima.UIMAException

loadJCas

public static void loadJCas(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jCas,
                            String xmlFileName,
                            boolean isXmi)
                     throws IOException
This method takes a JCas, resets it, and loads it with the contents of an XMI or XCAS file

Parameters:
jCas -
xmlFileName - a file name for an XML file containing XMI or XCAS content.
isXmi - if true, than assume XMI format. Otherwise, assume XCAS.
Throws:
IOException

loadJCas

public static void loadJCas(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas jCas,
                            InputStream xmlInputStream,
                            boolean isXmi)
                     throws IOException
This method takes a JCas, resets it, and loads it with the contents of an XMI or XCAS input stream

Parameters:
jCas -
xmlInputStream - should contain the contents of a serialized CAS in the form of XMI or XCAS XML
isXmi - if true, than assume XMI format. Otherwise, assume XCAS.
Throws:
IOException
